title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: XLM Gains 9.8% as All Assets Trade Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Hedera (HBAR) joined Stellar (XLM) as a top performer, gaining 7% from Tuesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 3607.26, up 3.6% (+125.91) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

All 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: XLM (+9.8%) and HBAR (+7.0%).

Laggards: ETC (+0.8%) and POL (+1.3%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: All 20 assets in the CoinDesk 20 Index are trading higher with the index up 3.6%, indicating broad market gains and positive momentum.
